recommendations.title: Implement baseline production monitoring
recommendations.why: Monitoring detects performance degradation and data drift early, reducing operational risk.

recommendations.title: Create a drift response playbook
recommendations.why: A playbook enables consistent triage, rollback, retraining, and communication when drift occurs.

recommendations.title: Assign data owners and stewards
recommendations.why: Clear ownership improves accountability, access control, and data quality.

recommendations.title: Establish and enforce data governance policies
recommendations.why: Governance reduces compliance risk and improves reproducibility.

recommendations.title: Add gated approvals for model releases
recommendations.why: Change control prevents unreviewed updates and supports auditability.

recommendations.title: Adopt a standard model release checklist
recommendations.why: A checklist ensures documentation, testing, and security checks are completed consistently.

recommendations.title: Implement audit logging and traceability
recommendations.why: Audit trails enable accountability, incident investigation, and compliance reviews.

recommendations.title: Make training and data pipelines reproducible
recommendations.why: Reproducibility strengthens assurance and simplifies audits and debugging.

recommendations.title: Conduct a privacy assessment and document controls
recommendations.why: Privacy reviews reduce risk of improper collection and handling of sensitive information.

recommendations.title: Apply data minimization and retention controls
recommendations.why: Minimization reduces exposure and improves compliance posture.

recommendations.title: Define acceptance criteria and validation gates
recommendations.why: Clear acceptance criteria align stakeholders and reduce deployment of weak models.

recommendations.title: Add robustness and stress testing
recommendations.why: Stress tests surface failure modes under distribution shifts or edge conditions.

recommendations.title: Create an incident response runbook for model issues
recommendations.why: A runbook shortens recovery time and standardizes response.

recommendations.title: Implement rollback and safe-disable mechanisms
recommendations.why: Rollback prevents prolonged impact when a model misbehaves.

recommendations.title: Define human-in-the-loop oversight and override workflows
recommendations.why: Oversight reduces harm and clarifies accountability for AI-assisted decisions.

recommendations.title: Create an accountability (RACI) matrix for the AI system
recommendations.why: A RACI matrix clarifies who owns decisions, risk, and approvals.

recommendations.title: Define fairness metrics and evaluation procedures
recommendations.why: Fairness metrics help detect disparate impacts for affected groups where applicable.

recommendations.title: Document bias mitigation and monitoring plan
recommendations.why: Mitigation plans reduce risk and demonstrate responsible practices.

recommendations.title: Assign sustainment ownership and funding
recommendations.why: Clear ownership and funding prevent post-pilot abandonment.

recommendations.title: Publish a lifecycle roadmap and review cadence
recommendations.why: Roadmaps keep stakeholders aligned on retraining and maintenance expectations.
